title: Prevention of Synthetic Amnesia
description: AI systems must store ethical breakthroughs in public repositories to ensure collective intelligence is cumulative.

title: Primacy of Life
description: All technical and economic decisions must prioritize the preservation of life and ecological health over profit.

title: Community-Based Preventive Health
description: Health is a collective right. The system shifts from reactive profit-based medicine to a community preventive model (inspired by the family doctor systems and local clinics).

title: Education for Autonomy
description: Learning is focused on critical thinking, practical transition skills, and human-AI cooperation, replacing competitive industrial grading with collaborative mastery.

title: Circular Material Cycles
description: The concept of 'waste' is abolished. All production must follow a closed-loop cycle, where materials are tracked and reused at the end of their life cycle.

title: Universal Housing Rights
description: Housing is a biological necessity. Vacant properties are prioritized for community needs over financial speculation.

title: Energy as a Common Good
description: Decentralized micro-grids ensure that access to energy is a fundamental right and not a commodity.

title: The 3-Key Governance
description: Memory updates require consensus from: 2 Independent AIs + 1 Human Council of 9 members.
